name: Candy land scene creation kit
description: Candy land scene creation kit for games and apps. Craft a huge variety of candy land backdrops using this large collection of foreground and background objects. Create scenes for plattformers, puzzlers, and many more game styles. This pack works with all the other candy assets available on this site, so you'r not limited to the objects found in this pack. The pack includes pngs and vector so you make make scenes any resolution you choose check out the contents tab to see all the assets included
